head.title: Salesmen
head.keywords: Free Software, Open Source, Auction, Webapp, Java, Jave EE, VUB, Vrije Universiteit Brussel, Computer Science, Belgium

webpage.para: As part of the Computer Science curriculum at the Vrije Universiteit Brussel, a group of senior students are assigned to contribute the software implementation of an online auction website to the Free Software community. This application will be written in the Java programming language.
